What the hell is a .flac-file ??? I can't play it
this is awesome. heaps of thanks

Thanks, keeybee!

@Zeeburg: Every decent software music player can play .flac (Free Lossless Audio Codec) files. Try jetaudio if your crappy wind0ws media player can't. Better yet, switch to linux (read "ubuntu") or even Solaris. Not that it will solve all your problems, but I will feel less inclined to kill you because you would have commited suicide already (hopefully).
